projects.title: Fubiz studio
projects.summary: En 2018, nous avons accompagn√© Romain Colin, cr√©ateur de Fubiz Media, dans le lancement de l‚Äôagence Fubiz‚Ä¢Studio, afin de mettre en avant les marques et les talents cr√©atifs mis en relation sur des projets inspirants.

awards.title: Awwwards Nominee Studio of the Year 2018

story.title: Mission
story.content:
We wanted to create an ambitious website that presents some of the talents and projects of Fubiz Studio while having a comprehensive and accurate overview We knew we would benefit from quality visuals and we do not want to create a simple directory of talents and projects. We aimed to create a real user experience.

As a creative studio, we wanted to challenge ourselves and offer a site different from a classic portfolio.

The large number of talents present on the site made us to find a real browsing experience in order to quickly have an exhaustive vision. We chose a grid in which we can navigate to discover talents and projects. We added the ability to list or filter talents/projects as well as switch from talents to projects.

Fubiz Studio is the link between talents and brands. It's a meeting place. Fubiz Studio is at the center of the creative process. The dot thus became for us an important shape that we would find on the identity and also in the website. After some consideration, it makes sense to use the dot as the main navigation element (cursor) of the website. The dot acts as a cursor in which contextual navigation indications appear. The dot is alive and guides us through talents and projects.

projects.title: Keus
projects.summary: Keus is a site that specializes in the sale of quality backpacks. The Keus team consists of designers and engineers, artists and stylists, photographers and audiovisual technicians‚Äîall of whom are committed to testing and selecting the best backpacks on the market.

awards.title: Awwwards Nominee ecommerce of the Year 2018

story.title: Concept
story.content: For this project, we created the branding for Keus. So, for the web design, we aimed to generate a technical branding, creating a grid system with bold typography and a hint of pure blue.

story.title: Horizontal Scroll
story.content:
The backpacks behave like paintings in an art gallery, we unroll the page from left to right as if we were walking in a gallery. We wanted to create an online shopping experience with a horizontal scroll.

The horizontal scroll creates a unique experience, allowing users to enjoy the products and gain a rich understanding about each of them.
